name: Unarmed (Wouter De Moor, PoisonousSheep, ThomasVansteelandt, Antijn van der Gun, DaffierPear, Miszla)
name_original: Unarmed (Wouter De Moor, PoisonousSheep, ThomasVansteelandt, Antijn van der Gun, DaffierPear, Miszla)
description:
The sword of destiny has two edges. Charlie The Wizard is one of them.

Go to a chest and click it

Left click on the weapon and hold, throw it on release

Defeat all the enemies
